com.marklogic.hub.cli.command

Class AbstractVerifyCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marklogic.client.ext.helper.LoggingObject
      • com.marklogic.hub.cli.command.AbstractInstallerCommand
        • com.marklogic.hub.cli.command.AbstractVerifyCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InstallerCommand
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VerifyDhfInDhsCommand

    public abstract class AbstractVerifyCommand
extends AbstractInstallerCommand
    Contains verifications that are common to either a local or DHS installation of DHF.
